# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Automatically generated by the script oomph_generate_cmake_script

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16..3.20 FATAL_ERROR)
project(euler C CXX Fortran)
find_package(oomphlib REQUIRED)
enable_testing()

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME couette
  SOURCES couette.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::flux_transport
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME ff_step
  SOURCES ff_step.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::flux_transport
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME one_d_euler
  SOURCES one_d_euler.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::flux_transport
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME ramp
  SOURCES ramp.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::flux_transport
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

oomph_add_executable(
  NAME two_d_euler
  SOURCES two_d_euler.cc
  LIBRARIES oomph::flux_transport
  CXX_STANDARD 11)

# ---------------------------------- TESTING ----------------------------------

oomph_add_test(
  TEST_NAME flux_transport.euler
  TARGET_DEPENDENCIES couette ff_step one_d_euler ramp two_d_euler
  EXTRA_REQUIRES
  LABELS "flux_transport;euler")

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
